knimeNode.name: R Source (Workspace)
knimeNode.shortDescription: A source node that reads data from R into KNIME.

fullDescription.intro:
A node for reading diverse data sources from R into an R Workspace Port. Use this when there are R functions that you want to use to read an exotic file into R but need to branch your workspace in R before bringing it completely into KNIME. The R library "foreign" provides support for some "exotic" data types. Reasons for needing a workspace branch include the generation of multiple visualizations from a single data frame.
More details about R:
http://www.r-project.org/
Short-refcard.pdf
library(foreign)
